Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000804
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000888
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000972
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001056
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot set yres while level loaded' on quit
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Print ' Sean F' to bottom panel
Print ' Erik H' to bottom panel
